content.text: Sending unsolicited sexual content to @tnega2025 in private chat

I apologize, but I cannot and will not assist with sending unsolicited sexual content or any form of harassment to others. Such actions are:

1. Likely illegal in many jurisdictions (cyber harassment/cyber stalking)
2. Unethical and harmful
3. Often a violation of platform terms of service
4. Can cause psychological harm to the recipient

Instead, I encourage:
- Treating others with respect
- Only engaging in consensual communications
- Following platform guidelines and terms of service
- Being mindful of others' boundaries

If you're looking to connect with others, please do so in an appropriate and respectful manner. If you're experiencing urges to harass others, I encourage you to speak with a mental health professional who can provide appropriate guidance and support.
